**Solicitation Number: 21C20-23-4270488/A**
**Publication Date: 2023-02-16**
**Tender Closing Date: 2023-04-12T17:00:00**

**Title:**
Installation Services - NCR - CORCAN

This solicitation issued by the Correctional Service of Canada is seeking a contractor to provide installation services for CORCAN furniture and related support services in the National Capital Region (NCR).

**Background:**
The contract is expected to run from the date of award until 31-October-2024, with the option to renew for two additional one-year periods.

**Trade Agreements:**
This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), as well as other free trade agreements between Canada, Chile, Colombia, Honduras, Panama, and Peru.

**Tendering Process:**
All interested suppliers may submit a bid. The procurement strategy is competitive, with the lowest priced compliant bid being the preferred selection criterion.

**Security Requirements:**
The standing offer includes security requirements which must be met by the contractor.

**Statement of Work:**
The contractor will be required to:

* Install CORCAN workstations (existing and new)
* Dismantle and reconfigure CORCAN workstations
* Install other CORCAN furniture lines
* Provide a full range of repairs associated with warranty claims on CORCAN installed furniture

**Bidding Documents:**
The complete statement of work, evaluation criteria, and other bidding documents can be downloaded from the Buyandsell.gc.ca website.

**Post-Award Requirements:**
After contract award, bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation process. Interested businesses may also attend Procurement Assistance Canada (PAC) seminars on government contracting.

**Language of Bid:**
Documents may be submitted in either English or French. Note that the Crown assumes no liability for the accuracy, completeness, or fitness for use of the information contained in this solicitation. by the tender closing date.
